version_description: General bug fixes and performance improvements
General bug fixes and performance improvements
General bug fixes and messaging improvements
new feature and bug fixes

Introducing a new way to smile at other users - because smiling helps show your interest to other users.
Now it is easier to find other singles with mutual interests and background. If she's great, give her a smile back. If he's awesome, send him a smile. Helping to form closer knit relationships.

Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bugfixes and app improvements.

You can now sign up and log in using your phone number!

Note: This requires receiving a verification code, so text message rates from your carrier may apply.

Let us know how your experience is going at feedback@eastmeeteast.com.

Our livestream chat has a new look! We tidied things up and also added some flair to our top gifting streamers!

Let us know how your experience is going at feedback@eastmeeteast.com.

• Made improvements to our live stream gifting!
• Fixed an issue that was messing with our push notifications.

Let us know how your experience is going at feedback@eastmeeteast.com.
Some users were experiencing an issue where they repeatedly prompted to enable push notifications. We fixed it!

• Updated our premium messaging service with a new look and better performance.
• Notifications now support images of your matches and followed streamers.

We're working hard to improve your experience and would love to hear your feedback! Contact us at feedback@eastmeeteast.com with concerns and suggestions.

We added more ways to buy Diamonds for gifting on live stream!

Let us know how your experience is going at feedback@eastmeeteast.com.
Bugfixes
We've updated our subscription plans on the app so now you have more choices to take advantage of everything that EastMeetEast has to offer!
We fixed a bug that’s messing with our sort functionality.

• We added more ways for you to purchase Diamonds to give gifts to broadcasters!
• We heard your feedback, and this version includes numerous stability and performance improvements!

As always, we love to hear how your experience is going! Please send us a note to hello@eastmeeteast.com

• Make it snappy! Streaming performance and load times are improved.
• We squashed a bug that was messing with some users' read receipts!
• Stability improvements and other bug fixes.

We love to hear how your experience is going! Send us a note to hello@eastmeeteast.com

Squashed those bugs and fixed other performance issues. Happy 'smiling'!

Fixed some performance issues.
Improved experience for smaller devices.
NEW - Streamers and fans, look out for our first animated gift!

We love to hear how your dates are going; let us know at hello@eastmeeteast.com.
If you enjoyed your experience with EME, please take the time to give us a review!

EME Community, we're always looking to improve your experience.

This release fixes some issues that popped up that our users were reporting.
Happy matching!

We fixed an issue loading profiles from certain pages.

We hope you're having a great time on EME!

- Set your distance search filter to the maximum setting to connect with users across the world!
- Now you can easily access live streams from the top of the search page!
- We improved performance across the board and knocked out a number of other bugs.

We love to hear how your experience is going! Send us a note at hello@eastmeeteast.com

• Some users were reporting that they could not edit their "About Me" profile section. We fixed it!
• We also fixed a bug that was affecting our messaging feature.

We love to hear from our community! Send us a note to hello@eastmeeteast.com

• We've made further improvements to your live streaming experience!
• Numerous bugs and stability fixes.

We love to hear about your experience with the community! Send us a note at hello@eastmeeteast.com

• We fixed an issue that was preventing "Report User" from working in some cases.

We love to hear about your experience with the community! Send us a note at hello@eastmeeteast.com

We fixed a broadcasting issue.

We love hearing about your experience with the community! Send us some love at hello@eastmeeteast.com

• Try out our improved karaoke and mystery question gifts!
• Numerous other bug, stability, and performance fixes.
• We've slimmed down the app so it takes up less space on your phone!

We love to hear about your experience with the community! Send us a note at hello@eastmeeteast.com
